pr_title: Fix Extractor edge case with value of a single comma.

timeline.message:
Alternate fix for #1319

Turns out the issue wasn't with an empty string returning an empty array, but a string with just `,`.
```
jshell> ",".split(",")
$1 ==> String[0] {  }
```
A non-intuitive edge case in my opinion.

timeline.bodyText: The else case here means that value will be left simply as ,. Should it be explicitly set to null or empty string instead?
timeline.author: tylerbenson
